name: Tokyo 2020: Against the Odds
description:
Install instructions

All files of the game that are provided (graphic, music, and exe file) must be downloaded (make sure that ALL files are include and are in the same location). Once all files are downloaded, double click the exe file ("main") to run the game (When running, a warning sign may pop up, just run the program anyway and things should work fine). Additionally, all files are located in the Submission files for TSA.
